Install

pip install openhsi

Requirements

  • Python 3.6+
  • Ximea SDK (See https://www.ximea.com/support/wiki/apis/Python)

How to use

Fill me in please! Don't forget code examples:

{% raw %} 
from openhsi import *

take_show()
